html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-07772015-06-04,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Suzanne Côté ** Removal Allowance **
PrecisOrder authorizing an ADDITIONAL REIMBURSEMENT PERIOD FROM JUNE 1 TO DECEMBER 1, 2015 for the HON. SUZANNE CÔTÉ, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, further to her relocation from Montréal, Quebec to the National Capital Region, for TRAVELLING AND LODGING COSTS, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of the permanent new residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still residing in the former residence.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Hon. Suzanne Côté ** Removal Allowance **
precis: Order authorizing an ADDITIONAL REIMBURSEMENT PERIOD FROM JUNE 1 TO DECEMBER 1, 2015 for the HON. SUZANNE CÔTÉ, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, further to her relocation from Montréal, Quebec to the National Capital Region, for TRAVELLING AND LODGING COSTS, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of the permanent new residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still residing in the former residence.
